TriggerOraclev10g.name: TRG_OPTIUNIFISE_UPD_BEFORE_ROW
TriggerOraclev10g.body: BEGIN <br/> NULL ;<br/>/*<br/> IF :NEW.idfisa <> NVL(pac_variabile_globale.vg_idfisa_crt,0) THEN <br/> pac_variabile_globale.vg_idfisa_crt := :NEW.idfisa ;<br/> Update Fisainscriere <br/> Set opcorectie = admitere.pac_variabile_globale.vg_operator,<br/> stcorectie = admitere.pac_variabile_globale.vg_statie,<br/> datacorectie = sysdate <br/> Where idfisa = :new.idfisa ; --AND datacorectie < sysdate - (5/(60*24));<br/> END IF ; */<br/>END ;<br/>
